title: Cup
description:
Large undecorated green glazed faience cup, flower pot shape. 
Condition: One large break in rim, glaze badly worn in spots and discolored. Glaze on base seems to be original condition and is dark blue in color. Piece may be of the early Roman Period though this is improbable. Interior badly worn and has a rust-color deposit.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
